column2: "Sɛ nnyɛ EWURADZE na odzii hɛn afa a
"Sɛ nnyɛ EWURADZE na odzii hɛn afa
column3: Ber a adasa soɛɛr hɛn do no a:"
Ber a hɔn ebufuw dzɛɛw hɛn do no:"
Nkyɛ esutsen no faa hɛn kra do."

column2: "Nkyɛ esu begyabegya no faa hɛn kra do."

column3: Ɔno a ɔammfa hɛn annyɛ afonam amma hɔn se."

column2: "Hɛn kra efi nsa dɛ mbrɛ anoma fi efirsuafo efir mu: Efir ebubu

column3: Ɔno a ɔyɛɛ sor na asaase no."
